stories.Title: AI could be our big asteroid impact
stories.Description: The CEOs of leading AI companies such as OpenAI, Deepmind, and Anthropics have signed a public statement highlighting the risks AI poses to humanity, including extinction.
stories.Tweet: AI could be our big asteroid impact 📦 The CEOs of leading AI companies such as OpenAI, Deepmind, and Anthropics have signed a public statement highlighting the risks AI poses to humanity, including extinction. #ai https://www.businessinsider.com/ai-extinction-risk-openai-deepmind-anthropic-ceos-sam-altman-2023-5

stories.Title: Nvidia gets by with a little help from AI
stories.Description: The company has reached a remarkable trillion-dollar valuation, propelled by the popularity of generative AI tools, as their chips become the preferred choice for most AI-driven projects.
stories.Tweet: Nvidia gets by with a little help from AI 📦 The company has reached a remarkable trillion-dollar valuation, propelled by the popularity of generative AI tools, as their chips become the preferred choice for most AI-driven projects. #nvidia https://www.theverge.com/2023/5/30/23742123/nvidia-stock-ai-gpu-1-trillion-market-cap-price-value

stories.Title: Ride smarter with Nvidia and MediaTek
stories.Description: By fusing Nvidia's AI and ADAS technology with MediaTek's Dimensity Auto Platform, both companies aim to deliver a new level of intelligence and connectivity to your daily commute.
stories.Tweet: Ride smarter with Nvidia and MediaTek 📦 By fusing Nvidia's AI and ADAS technology with MediaTek's Dimensity Auto Platform, both companies aim to deliver a new level of intelligence and connectivity to your daily commute. #nvidia https://electrek.co/2023/05/29/nvidia-upgrading-in-car-experience-ai-software/

stories.Title: With AI you could be a programmer too
stories.Description: According to Jensen Huang, CEO of Nvidia, generative AI will enable people to create desired functions without ever having to write code.
stories.Tweet: With AI you could be a programmer too 📦 According to Jensen Huang, CEO of Nvidia, generative AI will enable people to create desired functions without ever having to write code. #nvidia https://www.cnbc.com/2023/05/30/everyone-is-a-programmer-with-generative-ai-nvidia-ceo-.html

stories.Title: CapeChat: Keep data private
stories.Description: This powerful tool automatically encrypts your documents and redacts sensitive data, all while utilizing the ChatGPT API.
stories.Tweet: CapeChat: Keep data private 📦 This powerful tool automatically encrypts your documents and redacts sensitive data, all while utilizing the ChatGPT API. #ai https://www.producthunt.com/posts/capechat

stories.Title: India is reaching space
stories.Description: The NVS 01 satellite, the first of a new generation, has been launched by the country. Aimed to boost India's navigation system, and work alongside global networks for improved positioning.
stories.Tweet: India is reaching space 📦 The NVS 01 satellite, the first of a new generation, has been launched by the country. Aimed to boost India's navigation system, and work alongside global networks for improved positioning. #space https://spaceflightnow.com/2023/05/29/gslv-f12-nvs-01-coverage/

stories.Title: Let a robot do your housework
stories.Description: Prosper Robotics is turning futuristic ideas into reality with "Alfie," a robot butler capable of tackling various tasks such as dishwashing, laundry, and cleaning.
stories.Tweet: Let a robot do your housework 📦 Prosper Robotics is turning futuristic ideas into reality with "Alfie," a robot butler capable of tackling various tasks such as dishwashing, laundry, and cleaning. #robotics https://sifted.eu/articles/robot-butler-openai-prosper-robotics

stories.Title: The last view before darkness
stories.Description: Over nine and a half years, NASA's Kepler Space Telescope gazed for exoplanets. Now astronomers reveal what could be the telescope's final discoveries before fading into cosmic history.
stories.Tweet: The last view before darkness 📦 Over nine and a half years, NASA's Kepler Space Telescope gazed for exoplanets. Now astronomers reveal what could be the telescope's final discoveries before fading into cosmic history. #space https://news.mit.edu/2023/telescopes-last-view-kepler-planets-0530

stories.Title: Elon Musk's latest trip sparks rumors
stories.Description: The CEO's visit to China is generating anticipation among Tesla enthusiasts around a potential "Full Self-Driving" Beta release, and the launch of a new Model 3.
stories.Tweet: Elon Musk's latest trip sparks rumors 📦 The CEO's visit to China is generating anticipation among Tesla enthusiasts around a potential "Full Self-Driving" Beta release, and the launch of a new Model 3. #tesla https://electrek.co/2023/05/30/elon-musk-china-sparking-rumors-tesla-fsd-beta-new-model-3/

stories.Title: Tesla says: Canada you’re next!
stories.Description: With the launch of a pilot route from Ottawa to Sudbury, Tesla's Supercharger network is expanding across the country, allowing other EVs to charge at some of its existing spots.
stories.Tweet: Tesla says: Canada you’re next! 📦 With the launch of a pilot route from Ottawa to Sudbury, Tesla's Supercharger network is expanding across the country, allowing other EVs to charge at some of its existing spots. #tesla https://www.engadget.com/tesla-will-open-its-supercharger-network-to-other-evs-in-canada-150057481.html

stories.Title: Proxima Fusion presents “Stellarator”
stories.Description: The German startup has secured funding for its revolutionary fusion machine, paving the way for a cleaner future provided through atom-fusing power.
stories.Tweet: Proxima Fusion presents “Stellarator” 📦 The German startup has secured funding for its revolutionary fusion machine, paving the way for a cleaner future provided through atom-fusing power. #startups https://thenextweb.com/news/german-startup-fusion-stellarator

stories.Title: Meet the Battery Tanker X
stories.Description: PowerX, a Japanese startup, is all about sustainability with its groundbreaking ship designed to transport electricity using energy storage systems.
